chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall t : fol.Term LNN, freeVarTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) = freeVarTerm LNN t

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
LNN2LNT_term = fix LNN2LNT_term (t : fol.Term LNN) : Term := match t with | @fol.var _ v => var v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNT f (LNN2LNT_terms (arity LNN (inr f)) ts) end with LNN2LNT_terms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) {struct ts} : Terms n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (Terms n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNT | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNT m (LNN2LNT_term s) (LNN2LNT_terms m ss) end for LNN2LNT_term : fol.Term LNN -> Term
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (in
freeVarTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> list nat
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
freeVarPlus : forall x y : Term, freeVarTerm LNT (Plus x y) = freeVarTerm LNT x ++ freeVarTerm LNT y
freeVarTimes : forall x y : Term, freeVarTerm LNT (Times x y) = freeVarTerm LNT x ++ freeVarTerm LNT y
freeVarSucc : forall x : Term, freeVarTerm LNT (Succ x) = freeVarTerm LNT x
LNN.freeVarTimes : forall x y : LNN.Term, freeVarTerm LNN (LNN.Times x y) = freeVarTerm LNN x ++ freeVarTerm LNN y
LNN.freeVarPlus : forall x y : LNN.Term, freeVarTerm LNN (LNN.Plus x y) = freeVarTerm LNN x ++ freeVarTerm LNN y
LNN.freeVarSucc : forall x : LNN.Term, freeVarTerm LNN (LNN.Succ x) = freeVarTerm LNN x
LNN.freeVarLT : forall x y : LNN.Term, freeVarFormula LNN (LNN.LT x y) = freeVarTerm LNN x ++ freeVarTerm LNN y
subTermNil : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> substituteTerm L t v s = t
freeVarZero = eq_refl : freeVarTerm LNT Zero = nil
subAllTerm_ext : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerm L t) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerm L t m1 = subAllTerm L t m2
LNN.freeVarZero = eq_refl : freeVarTerm LNN LNN.Zero = nil
freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
translateLT1 : forall (a a0 : fol.Term LNN) (b0 : fol.Terms LNN 0), translateLT (Tcons LNN 1 a (Tcons LNN 0 a0 b0)) = subAllFormula LNT LTFormula (fun H : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => fol.Term LNT) (LNN2LNT_term a) (fun (H0 : nat) (_ : fol.Term LNT) => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => fol.Term LNT) (LNN2LNT_term a0) (fun (H1 : nat) (_ : fol.Term LNT) => var H1) H0) H)
freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
freeVarSubAllTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerm L t) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm L t m))
freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm L t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
subTermTrans : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerm L t)) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerm L t v1 s
codeArityLNNRIsCorrect1 : forall r : Relations LNN, codeArityLNNR (codeLNNRelation r) = S (arity LNN (inl r))
codeArityLNNFIsCorrect1 : forall f : Functions LNN, codeArityLNTF (codeLNTFunction f) = S (arity LNN (inr f))
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
subSubTerm : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v2 s2) v1 (substituteTerm L s1 v2 s2)
LNN2LNT_or : forall a b : fol.Formula LNN, LNN2LNT_formula (fol.orH LNN a b) = orH (LNN2LNT_formula a) (LNN2LNT_formula b)
LNN2LNT_and : forall a b : fol.Formula LNN, LNN2LNT_formula (fol.andH LNN a b) = andH (LNN2LNT_formula a) (LNN2LNT_formula b)

```coq
intros t.
induction t using Term_Terms_ind.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. f_equal. apply IHt. Qed.
```

original: intros t. induction t using Term_Terms_ind. - simpl. auto. - simpl. f_equal. apply IHt.
